product_types AS title";}i:2;a:10:{s:3:"#id";i:5;s:6:"#field";s:25:"LINKED_PRODUCT_GROUP_NAME";s:12:"#originField";s:9:"PARENT_ID";s:5:"#type";s:5:"int64";s:5:"#kind";s:6:"lookup";s:4:"#ref";s:20:"store/PRODUCT_GROUPS";s:10:"#refSchema";s:5:"store";s:11:"#refDataset";s:14:"PRODUCT_GROUPS";s:8:"#refType";s:4:"join";s:8:"@columns";a:6:{s:7:"#schema";s:5:"store";s:8:"#dataset";s:14:"PRODUCT_GROUPS";s:10:"@columnSet";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:3:"#id";i:6;s:6:"#field";s:21:"THE_PARENT_GROUP_NAME";s:12:"#originField";s:4:"NAME";s:5:"#type";s:6:"string";s:6:"#label";s:17:"Parent group name";}}s:9:"#keyField";s:16:"PRODUCT_GROUP_ID";s:11:"#tableAlias";s:3:"ta3";s:19:"#keyFieldScriptName";s:20:"ta3.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID";}}}s:9:"#keyField";s:16:"PRODUCT_GROUP_ID";s:11:"#tableAlias";s:3:"ta2";s:19:"#keyFieldScriptName";s:20:"ta2.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID";}}i:3;a:10:{s:3:"#id";i:7;s:6:"#field";s:23:"PRODUCT_SECOND_GROUP_ID";s:12:"#originField";s:23:"PRODUCT_SECOND_GROUP_ID";s:5:"#type";s:5:"int64";s:5:"#kind";s:6:"lookup";s:4:"#ref";s:25:"main:store/PRODUCT_GROUPS";s:10:"#refSchema";s:5:"store";s:11:"#refDataset";s:14:"PRODUCT_GROUPS";s:8:"#refType";s:4:"join";s:8:"@columns";a:6:{s:7:"#schema";s:5:"store";s:8:"#dataset";s:14:"PRODUCT_GROUPS";s:10:"@columnSet";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:3:"#id";i:8;s:6:"#field";s:25:"PRODUCT_SECOND_GROUP_NAME";s:12:"#originField";s:4:"NAME";s:5:"#type";s:6:"string";s:6:"#label";s:17:"Second group name";}}s:9:"#keyField";s:16:"PRODUCT_GROUP_ID";s:11:"#tableAlias";s:3:"ta4";s:19:"#keyFieldScriptName";s:20:"ta4.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID";}}i:4;a:10:{s:3:"#id";i:9;s:6:"#field";s:16:"PRODUCT_TYPE_ID1";s:12:"#originField";s:16:"PRODUCT_TYPE_ID1";s:5:"#type";s:5:"int64";s:5:"#kind";s:6:"lookup";s:4:"#ref";s:27:"memdata:store/PRODUCT_TYPES";s:10:"#refSchema";s:5:"store";s:11:"#refDataset";s:13:"PRODUCT_TYPES";s:8:"#refType";s:8:"linknext";s:14:"#refDatasource";s:7:"memdata";}}s:9:"#keyField";s:10:"PRODUCT_ID";s:11:"#tableAlias";s:3:"ta1";s:19:"#keyFieldScriptName";s:14:"ta1.PRODUCT_ID";}s:11:"#readScript";s:404:"SELECT ta1.SKU,ta1.TITLE,ta1.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID,ta2.NAME,ta2.TITLE,ta2.PARENT_ID,ta3.NAME,ta1.PRODUCT_SECOND_GROUP_ID,ta4.NAME,ta1.PRODUCT_TYPE_ID1 FROM 
((products AS ta1 LEFT JOIN product_groups AS ta2 ON ta1.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID=ta2.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID)
 LEFT JOIN product_groups AS ta3 ON ta2.PARENT_ID=ta3.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID)
 LEFT JOIN product_groups AS ta4 ON ta1.PRODUCT_SECOND_GROUP_ID=ta4.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID";}
